channel.title: Request
channel.description: Hey I need some help. Me and my friend are going to make are own online game. NO not an MMORPG just a little one. He does all the client and I'm doing the server. Is their anyway some could give/make me source for a java chat program that anyone mutli people can connect to? And if this is to big can anyone point me in the right direction ? Thanks a ton :)

item.title: Request
item.dc:creator: @rjop455 rjop455
item.description:
@rjop455 wrote:

Thanks a ton you don’t know how much this helps :).

I would give you rep but I don’t think I can yet

Read full topic

item.title: Request
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

I made this a while ago. The coding is pretty bad, and when you log in more than one person, all the people have the name of the last person to log in. But you can probably change that. Have fun.

Read full topic
